title: If you were to choose among the philosophical perspectives that you could possibly relate in your own perspective when it comes to art, what would it be and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any picture, any movie, any represestation of the universe and cosmos. Don't think there is any difference between the inner and outer, but as humanbeing, we can choose whether we want to destroy ourselves or not. I choose the latter. Every life is precious. But me too has a long way to go to embrace what I need, with the least destructive force.
